Title: Batman: Mystery of the Batwoman
Genre: Animation, Action, Crime, Mystery, Romance, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Director: Curt Geda, Jennifer Graves, Tim Maltby
Writer: Bob Kane (character created by: Batman), Alan Burnett (story), Michael Reaves
Actors: Kevin Conroy, Kimberly Brooks, Kelly Ripa, Elisa Gabrielli
Plot: The Dark Knight must contend with a mysterious female vigilante who emulates him, but to a more ruthless degree.
